trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>eventos permite-lhe personalizar (ou desenhados) o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo na vista de detalhes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `true` e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs transmitido para o processador de eventos contém informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar e também fornece métodos para o ajudar a desenhar o subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A>Propriedades para obter informações sobre o item principal de subitem para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>autónomo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>propriedade ao obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>que representa o cabeçalho da coluna em que é apresentado o subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade para fazer o desenho real na área de especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementos que não precisam de personalização, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>propriedade quando pretender que o sistema operativo para desenhar o subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando pretender personalizar apenas específicos subitems.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para evitar problemas com gráficos flickering quando o proprietário de desenho, substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta funcionalidade só está disponível no Windows XP e família Windows Server 2003 quando a aplicação chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e a localização do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A localização especificada por esta propriedade é relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> coluna na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>coluna dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>utilizando a cor de fundo atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para desenhar um fundo padrão que utiliza o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O fundo é desenhado para preencher a área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve ser definido como `false` para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor do item principal de substituir o valor de subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>deve ser desenhada pelo sistema operativo em vez de proprietário-desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event for subitems that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade quando o processamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento para subitems que não pretende personalizar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: Se definir esta propriedade para `true`, será desenhada a subitem normalmente utilizando os valores atuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades > [!NOTE] > o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve ser definido como `false` para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor do item principal de substituir o valor de subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o subitem deve ser desenhada pelo sistema operativo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> if the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um retângulo de foco de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>se principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> tem foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para desenhar um retângulo de foco padrão em torno de subitem.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo de foco é desenhada um pixel no interior da área de especificado pelo `bounds` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Este é desenhado apenas quando o item principal tem o foco, pelo que não necessita de verificar o estado de foco do item antes de chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item.
trans-unit.target: Pode querer desenhar o retângulo de foco apenas em torno da primeira subitem (ou seja, o item principal, que é apresentado na primeira coluna) em vez de desenho-lo à volta de cada subitem de um item.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the normal behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Isto corresponde ao comportamento normal de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the DrawFocusRectangle method only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar o retângulo de foco à volta a primeira subitem, chame o método DrawFocusRectangle apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>valor é 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não fornece a capacidade de selecionar subitems individuais, mas se pretender implementar subitem seleção por si, pode utilizar este método para desenhar o retângulo de foco em torno de um subitem que não seja o primeiro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A área na qual desenhar o retângulo de foco.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>utilizando a cor de primeiro plano atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para desenhar o texto de subitem utilizando os valores atuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O texto é desenhado dentro da área de especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve ser definido como `false` para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores do item principal de substituir os valores de subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>utilizando a cor de primeiro plano atual e formatar com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para desenhar o texto de subitem utilizando os valores atuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O texto é desenhado dentro da área de especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>valores especificados no `flags` parâmetro permitem-lhe forneça as propriedades de formatação para a etiqueta de nó, como o alinhamento do texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve ser definido como `false` para impedir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores do item principal de substituir os valores de subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornece métodos útil para desenhar no dispositivo de apresentação e propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the header of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cabeçalho de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> coluna na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> for the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> para a coluna na qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>principal do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>propriedade não fornece informações adequadas para satisfazer as necessidades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>propriedade fornece apenas as informações de estado básico que pode utilizar, por exemplo, para determinar se o item principal é selecionado, marcado ou focado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item, por outro lado poder aceder a todos os membros do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para o acesso a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>que está a ser desenhado, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> que representa o principal do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>principal do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>Desenhar está num estado específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the parent item.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece apenas as informações de estado básico sobre o item principal.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade, por exemplo, para determinar se o item principal é selecionado, marcado ou concentra-se.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de saber mais, obter o item principal através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>propriedade e verifique as respetivas propriedades diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs> properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil quando o outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>Propriedades não fornecem informações adequadas para satisfazer as necessidades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The SubItem property allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SubItem permite-lhe aceder a todos os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>que está a ser desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de aceder a este objeto diretamente, por exemplo, para desenhar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor por si em vez de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>
